summary: THE RIGHT HAND (PASSENGER SIDE) FENDER OF A HARBOR FREIGHT HEAVY DUTY FOLDING UTILITY TRAILER  DETACHED FROM THE TRAILER WHILE IN THE COURSE OF OPERATION. THE FENDER MADE CONTACT WITH THE  TRAILER TIRE FOR A SHORT TIME CAUSING MINOR TIRE DAMAGE BEFORE COMING TO REST ON THE PAVEMENT.  THE TRAILER HAD BEEN IN OPERATION FOR APPROXIMATELY 1400 MILES BEFORE THE FENDER DETACHED.  THE FOUR FIXING BOLTS WERE SECURED WITH NYLON LOCK NUTS AS PROVIDED WITH THE KIT WITH NO SIGNS OF  BEING LOOSE PRIOR TO THE DETACHMENT.THE REMAINING FENDER WAS REMOVED AND IT WAS FOUND TO HAVE  DEVELOPED A CRACK IN THE THE CENTER OF THE SUPPORT BRACKET.  IT SHOULD BE NOTED THAT BOTH FENDERS WERE SUBJECT TO A GREAT DEAL OF VIBRATION IN THEIR NORMAL  COURSE OF DUTY. BOTH FENDERS COULD BE SEEN VIBRATING UP AND DOWN AS LONG AS THE TRAILER WAS IN  MOTION.  FROM THE CLOSE UP PHOTO OF THE BRACKET, THERE APPEAR TO BE 3 CRACKS FORMING: ONE AT THE CENTER,  AND ONE AT EACH BOLT HOLE.  1195 LB. CAPACITY HEAVY DUTY FOLDING UTILITY TRAILER, 48 IN. X 96 IN.  TRAILER GVWR: 1450LBS  TRAILER SERIES: 90154  TRAILER YEAR: 2013  TRAILER MFG: CHANGZHOU NANXIASHU  SOLD BY  HARBOR FREIGHT TOOLS  1803 VANCE JACKSON RD #105  SAN ANTONIO, TX 78213  ITEM WEBPAGE  HTTP://WWW.HARBORFREIGHT.COM/1195-LB-CAPACITY-48-INCH-X-96-INCH-HEAVY-DUTY-FOLDABLEUTILITY-  TRAILER-WITH-12-INCH-WHEELS-90154.HTML  *JS

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 CHANGZHOU NANXIASHU 90154 TRAILER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE PARKED THE VEHICLE AND NOTICED THAT A LUG NUT ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE TIRE WAS MISSING. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION. THE TRAILER WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.  ..UPDATED 12-30-13 *BF   UPDATED 01/14/2013 *JS
